findings.title: Liability cap carve-outs may negate protection
findings.rationale: Liability caps that exclude indemnity, confidentiality, or IP claims often negate the practical benefit of the cap entirely. Note: Carve-out may be required by law.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...5. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY Limitation of liability shall not apply to indemnification, except as required by applicable law....
findings.context:
l Confidential Information.

3. TERM
This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution.

4. INDEMNIFICATION
No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

5. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
Limitation of liability shall not apply to indemnification, except as required by applicable law.

6. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
All work product shall be assigned to the Disclosing Party, excluding

findings.title: Specific governing law or venue
findings.rationale: Governing law and venue choices can affect enforcement cost and strategy.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...11. GOVERNING LAW This Agreement is governed by applicable law....
findings.context:
es.

8. RENEWAL
This Agreement may be renewed by mutual written consent.

9. AUDIT RIGHTS
No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

10. LATE FEES
No late fees apply.

11. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement is governed by applicable law.

12. DEFINITIONS
Confidential Information means information marked as confidential.

This Agreement is executed on 2024-01-01.

changes: Added 8 high-signal rules (attorneys fees, liability cap carveouts, assignment restrictions, etc.)
Implemented clause-level anchoring and false-positive suppression
